Question: At ****'s insistence, Robertson and Kooper came down from New York City to play on the sessions.
Hints: Describing Guthrie's impact on him, this person later wrote: "The songs themselves had the infinite sweep of humanity in them ..
Nine of the ten songs on the album are credited as co-written by this person and Robert Hunter.
Rather than comply with the censorship, this person refused to appear on the program.
